resources.string: No favourities yet?\nStart saving them right away!\n(Go to Collections)
Compare all your favourite \npieces at one place

Welcome to Tanishq Galleria,your virtual catalogue! 
Gain access into Tanishq's vast reservior of stunning jewellery, add products to customer's wishlist, compare product side by side and lots more! 

Read on to familiarize yourself with Tanishq Galleria. 

 TO VIEW CATALOGUE 

1.Get started by logging into the app using your user name and mobile number.Click 'Submit' to recieve an OTP on the 	mobile number provided by you.
2.Enter OTP in the slot provided and press 'Enter' to log in. 
3.A pop-up banner of the latest collection from Tanishq will fill the screen.You may choose to close it. 
4.Once logged in, choose the collection you wish to explore or use the navigation icon on the top left corner to see the list 	of filters. 
Refine your search by selecting across the Categories , Collections , Occasions and Materials 
5.you will now view the products. Click on individual product to view their details. Select to add products to the wishlist, or 	click on to add them to the list of products to Compare .Add up to 6 products in the wishlist and compare up to 3 products. 

FOR HELP AND QUERIES 

1.Click on to view the list of functions you can perform using the app. 
2.To update the inventory, click on the Update Inventory Button. 
3.To make a customer product request, Click on the Product Request button. Fill the form provided on the page with 	details of the customer and press 'Submit'. 
4.To submit the customer query, click on the Customer query button.Fill the form provided on the page and press 'Submit'. 
5.To submit a feedback from a customer, click on the Feedback button. Choose from the list of subjects, fill in the detailed 	feed back and press 'Send' button.
